Some of his works were translated to English *The Street of Crocodiles *Sanatorium Under the Sign of the Hourglass *"Undula"; The original title was published in "Dawn: The Journal of Petroleum Officials in Boryslav". ==Related pages== *List of victims of Nazism Category:Polish writers Category:1892 births Category:1942 deaths
